en.doyouwantendquestion: Do you want to end {phase} now ?

en.choosetilequestion: Which one do you want to touch ?

en.choosenumberoffigures: Choose number of figures you want to move or move them all

en.numberofscoutsexceeds: Number of scouts to move exceeds the number of scouts at this point : {max}
